availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Nancy Devol. Father of William J. Devol, Lorinda Devol, Clark A. Devol, Lemon T. Devol, Barbara Devol, Charles F. Devol, and Nancy L. Devol. Farmer in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Employed Ephraim Keller as a windmill maker in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bristol, p. 328B-329A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bristol, p. 326.
